comments.text:
Mostrando tradução para Não espero mais que 30 minutos para apanhar carro para Paramaribo
Em vez disso, traduzir Não esperei mais que 30 minutos para apanhar carro para Paramaribo
I do not expect more than 30 minutes to catch car to Paramaribo

two ferries come each day from Guyana to Suriname we were on the first but had trouble with visas so we couldn't hitch a ride with the group we were with we waited for the second ferry which took a couple hours but a sick Brazilian couple from the second ferry took us to Paramaribo pretty easy to find nice crowd
